name: 120lb Cover Thick Cardstock Paper - Plain Heavy Bright White Stock - 8.5" x 11" (50 Sheets)
short_description: Extra Thick Cardstock perfect for invitations, post cards, covers, and business cards OR as a sturdy backing for your project
Made from 120lb Cover (325 gsm) Stock with a Smooth Matte finish – Great ink and toner adhesion
Measures Letter Size 8 1/2" x 11" - Made in the USA
IMPORTANT: Will not print on most home printers due to thickness. Please consult your printer manual before ordering to make sure it can handle 120lb Cover (325 gsm) cardstock.

NOTE: This stock is VERY thick. It will not fold smoothly without scoring first. It will not print on most home printers. Please consult your printer manual before ordering to make sure it can handle 120lb Cover (325 gsm) cardstock

name: Heavyweight 130 lb White Cardstock Thick Paper - 50 Sheets - A4-350gsm - Heavy Cover Cardstock for Business Card, Card Making, Invitations, Arts and Crafts
short_description: This heavy cardstock sheets made from 130lb (350 gsm) thick paper with a matte smooth finish (no surface coating). It has neat edge, no fracture after folding, no burr after cutting, very sturdy and durable.

Cover stock paper is perfect for invitations, brochure covers, post cards and business cards or as a sturdy protective backing for your project or photos. It’s colored thick cardstock also ideal for direct mail, promotional items, art painting, crafts and more.
Measured size: 8.27 inch x 11.69 inch; Colors: White cardstock, Ivory card stock & Black cardstock; Packing: 50 sheets/Pack. Thichness:0.4 mm.
Printable with Professional Quality or Flat Feed Inkjet & Laser Printers (Copiers too) - ONLY WORKS ON PROFESSIONAL PRINTERS THAT CAN HANDLE 130lb (350gsm) cover stock paper heavy.

NOTE: This premium quality cardstock is very thick. It will likely not work on a basic home printer. Please check your printer manual before ordering to make sure it can handle 130lb Cover (350 gsm) cardstock.
product_description: Our 130lb(350gsm) Cover Heavy Weight Cardstock Paper is thicker than the cover card stock or index cardstock commonly used in the market. So it’s sturdy, durable and multipurpose. Use it for all of your professional and heavy-duty paper needs. Its Super smooth finish provide a good printing surface for any excellent ink, can dry quickly. Make sure your printer can handle this thick paper before using it. Premium quality cardstock is perfect for any occasion like offices, schools, homes, etc. It’s ideal for Card making, Business Cards, Stationery, Invitations, Brochure Cover, Posters, greeting cards, Menus, handmade booklets, and more. Our Environmentally is friendly, recyclable and reusable. If the is seriously damaged when you receive it and affects normal use, we provide free replacement.

name: 50 Sheets of Heavyweight White Cardstock Ideal for Business Cards, Art Projects, Invitations, and Stationery Printing | 80 lb Weight | 8.5 x 11 inches | Thick Cover Stock (216 gsm) |
short_description: Premium Medium Weight Smooth Cardstock, White, 80lb, 176gsm, 8.5” x 11” – Ideal for Invitations, Menus, Business Cards - Printer Paper

Cranium Press offers thick, white card stock paper with a high bright-white shade and smooth finish. This premium medium cardstock paper ensures excellent printability, proper ink holdout, and minimal show-through, resulting in vibrant prints.

Our medium weight cardstock paper presents a thick, white option boasting a high bright-white shade and a smooth finish. This premium cardstock paper guarantees outstanding printability, effective ink holdout, and minimal show-through, ensuring vibrant prints.

Perfect for printing at home, school, or the office, this premium cardstock printer paper enhances colors, making them bolder, brighter, and more realistic. Additionally, it offers superior strength, making it ideal for die-cutting, scoring, and folding tasks.

Derived from sustainable sources, our papers are entirely made in the USA and hold Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certification. Purchasing our cardstock paper contributes to forest replenishment efforts and sustains forestry jobs for American landowners, fostering environmental and economic sustainability.

Complement your project seamlessly by pairing this 80lb cardstock from Cranium Press with Cranium Press text weight copy paper. Explore our range of text weight and cover weight papers available in super smooth, smooth, and vellum finishes for a cohesive look across your entire project lineup.
